children.value: Hi! Welcome to my portfolio. This is my first blog post. I'm not sure what should i write here, but i hope i'll find interesting things to share with you.

As I mentioned in About section, I'm a computer engineer, computer scientist also. I'm at the start of my career. I have strong desire to improve my self on every field of computer science as i can. I started my journey with web development. I plan to continue with mobile development. I think for now i'll look for Flutter and try to improve my self on Dart language and Flutter features.
I hope you like my portfolio. This post is short but i hope i will find interesting things to share with you.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: portfolio, umit kara, umitkara, ümit kara
